body_html:
followed the official instuctions..the pip command shows successfully installed tensorflow gpu... But still getting error(no module named tensorflow) when i use import tensorflow as tf.

Using Anaconda
body_text:
followed the official instuctions..the pip command shows successfully installed tensorflow gpu... But still getting error(no module named tensorflow) when i use import tensorflow as tf.
Using Anaconda
body:
followed the [official](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows) instuctions..the pip command shows successfully installed tensorflow gpu... But still getting error(**no module named tensorflow**) when i use import tensorflow as tf.

Using Anaconda
